Class Handler

java.lang.Object
Handler
public class Handler
extends java.lang.Object
Handles any object currently updating or being rendered

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private java.util.LinkedList<GameObject> objects
    LinkedList of GameObjects that will be updated using tick() or rendered
    Objects should be added when they are needed, and removed when no longer needed (i.e when deleting an object, make sure to remove it from this list)
    This is sorted in inverse order based on the Z-index, so that lower Z-indexes are rendered below higher ones

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Handler()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addObject​(GameObject object)
    Adds a given GameObject to the objects list, and sorts the list
    void removeObject​(GameObject object)
    Removes a given GameObject from the objects list.
    void render​(java.awt.Graphics g)
    Render function called every frame.
    This checks if an object in the objects list is on screen, and renders it only if it is.
    private void sortRenderableObjects()
    Sorts the objects within the objects list by their Z-index
    void tick()
    Tick function that is called every frame.
    This calls the tick() function of every member of the objects list

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Field Details

    • objects

      private java.util.LinkedList<GameObject> objects
      LinkedList of GameObjects that will be updated using tick() or rendered
      Objects should be added when they are needed, and removed when no longer needed (i.e when deleting an object, make sure to remove it from this list)
      This is sorted in inverse order based on the Z-index, so that lower Z-indexes are rendered below higher ones

  • Constructor Details

    • Handler

      public Handler()

  • Method Details

    • tick

      public void tick()
      Tick function that is called every frame.
      This calls the tick() function of every member of the objects list

    • render

      public void render​(java.awt.Graphics g)
      Render function called every frame.
      This checks if an object in the objects list is on screen, and renders it only if it is.
      Parameters:
      g - The Graphics object onto which everything will be rendered

    • sortRenderableObjects

      private void sortRenderableObjects()
      Sorts the objects within the objects list by their Z-index

    • addObject

      public void addObject​(GameObject object)
      Adds a given GameObject to the objects list, and sorts the list
      Parameters:
      object - The GameObject to be added to the objects list

    • removeObject

      public void removeObject​(GameObject object)
      Removes a given GameObject from the objects list.
      Parameters:
      object - The GameObject to be removed from the objects list
